# waypoint Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    waypoint = {
      source  = "hashicorp/waypoint"
      version = "0.1.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "waypoint" {
  waypoint_addr = "localhost:9701"
  token         = "..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `host` (String)
- `token` (String)
